item.description:
The Boston Beanstalks Tall Club is celebrating its 25th Anniversary Dance on Sat. Jan. 19th @ the Crowne Plaza in Natick.

We're looking forward to a really good party, lots of dancing and schmoozing with friends old and new!

Our dances are always public events, open to non-members as well as members - the only entrance requirement is that you be 21 years of age or older, and keen to party! You do not have to be tall - you just need to be keen to socialize, schmooze with friends and dance, dance, dance!

So if you're in town on Jan. 19th and want to "party hearty", please join us at the Crowne Plaza in Natick.

You can come for dinner and dance, or just dance only - whatever takes your fancy. And bring friends - the more, the merrier!

Schedule Of Events:
Cocktails start at 6pm, followed by a delicious sit-down dinner at 7pm.
The dance starts after dinner at approx. 8.30pm

Full event pricing and cut-off dates for the various discounts are on the flier at:
TallBall 2008 - Heights Of Elegance Flier

The $20 "event fee" posted for this event is for the "at the door" Dance ticket price for a non-BBTC/TCI member.
If you have not yet signed up to join the BBTC & have not paid $45 in annual dues, this is your price for the dance.
If you have signed up & paid your dues, $15 is the "at the door" Dance ticket price.

If you want to come for dinner, you will need to pre-register by 1/16/2008 (see flier for details), with our Event Registrar - please e-mail Susan at registrar@hubtall.org.

Please feel free to forward the details of this event to any of your friends or family that might be interested. The more, the merrier!!!

Hope y'all can make it & start 2008 off with a really festive bash!

Any questions, please let us know.
item.name: "Heights Of Elegance" - 25th Anniversary Dinner Dance Celebration
